revised_title: Interference Phenomena in Rayleigh and Nuclear Resonant Scattering of Gamma-Rays
tldr: The article examines the possibility of observing interference between nuclear resonant scattering and Rayleigh scattering of gamma-rays. It explores different scenarios and concludes that interference may be observable in some cases, which could aid in observing weak resonances against strong backgrounds. The study focuses on the electric dipole resonance observed in mercury and its implications for interference phenomena.
